name: Gloomy Toons
storyline:
In a rotten world… Sweet pups are now beast hunters. Their world is lost, but not their friends!

In Gloomy Toons, something happened at a certain point in history. You don't know exactly what, but now the world is full of abominable mutated creatures. The only ones who saved themselves are cute puppies, who won't hesitate to tear their enemies apart and explode them to save their friends!
